class.name: IKBone3D
class.brief_description: A class representing a 3D bone in an Inverse Kinematics system.
class.description: The IKBone3D class represents a 3D bone in an Inverse Kinematics (IK) system. It provides methods to get and set constraints, pins, and check if the bone is pinned.

method.name: get_constraint
method.description: Returns the IKKusudama3D object representing the constraint of the bone.

method.name: get_constraint_orientation_transform
method.description: Returns the IKNode3D object representing the orientation transform of the constraint.

method.name: get_constraint_twist_transform
method.description: Returns the IKNode3D object representing the twist transform of the constraint.

method.name: get_pin
method.description: Returns the IKEffector3D object representing the pin of the bone.

method.name: is_pinned
method.description: Returns true if the bone is pinned, false otherwise.

method.name: set_pin
method.description: Sets the IKEffector3D object representing the pin of the bone.
